text: nuharige upadesisalagidda hagu nimage navu divyavaniya mulaka talupisiruva mattu navu ibrahim, musa hagu isarige bodhisidda dharmavanne avanu nimagagi vidhisiddane. Dharmavannu sthapisiri mattu i visayadalli vibhinnaragabedi. Bahudevaradhakarige nivu niduttiruva kareyu tira apriyavagide. Allahanu tannedege (baruvudakke) tanicchisidavarannu arisikolluttane mattu avanu (tannatta) oliyuvavarige tannedege margadarsana niduttane
